title: Need some help cause i cant test it out currently
body: Do RP codes from EUNE work on EUW? i got a RP code as a gift but it says its for eune i wanna activate it on euw cause i already got tons of shit on my eune account so does it work? if not is there a way to switch the code on support before next monday cause i need one of the champs on sale? ty for your time

replies.body:
It may work, and I recommend giving it a go. If it doesn't then you can reach out to our billing specialists through a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) They may be able to work with you to find a solution.

Let me know if you have any questions.

many thanks blade i just wanted to see if someone had an idea if it worked cause its bugging me since i cant test it till tommorow night since i'm not home.If something pops up i'll just use support i guess.Again thank you
